definition[0]: an imaginary creature in stories that looks like an ugly person
definition[1]: someone who leaves offensive or upsetting messages on the Internet, just in order to get a reaction
definition[2]: to try to remove something from a river, ocean etc by pulling a rope, line etc through the water
example[0]: Ships towing huge magnets trolled the ocean floor.
example[1]: I would troll for fish from the rowboat.
definition[3]: to try to obtain something by searching, asking people etc
example[2]: Stewart spent hours trolling the Web for information.
definition[4]: to leave offensive or upsetting messages on the Internet, just in order to get a reaction
